title: Coroner identifies teen girl shot to death in Spartanburg Co.
content:
SPARTANBURG, SC (FOX Carolina) -
Deputies are investigating after teenage girl was shot and killed Monday morning.
Officials said the 17-year-old was shot at the Hidden Park Apartment complex Spruce Street.
The entrance to the complex was roped off with crime scene tape and investigators were on scene when FOX Carolina's crew arrived.
Deputies confirmed a female had been shot and was transported to the hospital by EMS. The coroner later said the teen succumbed to her injuries.
She was identified as 17-year-old Anna Marie Goode of Foster Street. The coroner said an autopsy is being conducted but the preliminary cause of death is a gunshot wound to the torso.
"The investigation is in its infancy stages, and more information will be released when it’s appropriate," Lt. Kevin Bobo stated in an e-mail.
